headline: From Apple to GM, Tariffs to Cost Companies Tens of Billions

headline: Boeing, Defense Stocks Take Off, But No Thanks To Industry Giants Lockheed, Northrop
summary: Boeing stock and the aerospace and defense industry have been taking off in the current stock market, but Lockheed and Northrop underperform.

headline: GE Vernova: What's Energizing This General Electric Spinoff? Eye-Popping Growth For Starters
